com.viper.database.dao

Class DatabaseFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viper.database.dao.DatabaseFactory

  • public class DatabaseFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory to generate the database interface object (DAO). Supported types of databases:
    1. Mongo
    2. jdbc
    3. hbase
    4. jta
    5. memory

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final DatabaseInterface getInstance(java.lang.String connectionName)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the database connection name, open a database (dao) object, of the appropriate database type. The connection name must be in a list of databases connections in the jar file root directory, under the filename databases.xml Note: An added feature the MemoryAdapter this adds an intercepter to the existing DAO engines, which will cache the data. The cache can have a time out, and a size limit. (TODO add a refresh cache method which will force cache be refreshed on next access. Use of memory adapter is triggered by the cache timeout parameter and/or the number of rows limit parameter.
        Parameters:
        connectionName - the name of the connection, specified in the configuration file of connections.
        Returns:
        the database interface (dao) object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - failure to get table data, no database, no table, bad connection, etc.

      • getInstance

        public static final DatabaseInterface getInstance(java.lang.String filename,
                                                  java.lang.String connectionName)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the database connection name, open a database (dao) object, of the appropriate database type. The connection name must be in a list of databases connections in the jar file root directory, under the filename databases.xml
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the database configuration file (XML), which contains the list of database connections.
        connectionName - the name of the connection, specified in the configuration file of connections.
        Returns:
        the database (dao) object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - failure to get table data, no database, no table, bad connection, etc.

      • getDatabaseConnection

        public static final com.viper.database.model.DatabaseConnection getDatabaseConnection(java.lang.String connectionName)
                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the database connection name, and the filename of database connections, return the named database connection object. The connection name must be in a list of databases connections in the jar file root directory, under the filename databases.xml
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the database configuration file (XML), which contains the list of database connections.
        connectionName - the name of the connection, specified in the configuration file of connections.
        Returns:
        the database connection object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - failure to get table data, no database, no table, bad connection, etc.
